channel.title: This on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in This on Let's see what happens.

item.title: The First Summer
item.description:
I found that I pay attention to the good quality views around me more. Summer of course.

There is another thing possibly due to how my memory works. It looks like it is the first time I pay this much attention.

And I think this is the case in many cases.

Like horison line with trees looks so much better. Even colors of leafs and sky there.

Overall blossoming of course is so plentiful. And color gradations on different trees tells you something about them.
